text.p: True or False: If the dimension of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is 4, then every list of 4 vectors in [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] must be a basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: False. For example, [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] has dimension 4. The list [mathjaxinline]\{ e_1; 2e_1; 3e_1; 4e_1\}[/mathjaxinline] contains 4 vectors, but they are linearly dependent and thus the list is not a basis of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline].
